text:
I'm using the example code from the docs (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-tags>)

By doing further tests, I verified that the same code placed in a module does give no results while if I put it in the main base.html template then it works.
Furthermore, by trying on a different installation relating to another account the same code works everywhere even in the module.
Do you have any idea why it doesn't work in that particular installation?

Hey Everyone,

Im trying to have tailwind prettier installed with hubl
I already have tailwind with hubl installed that working fine.
But i also would like to have the tailwind formating installed but i cant seem to get it to work.
Somebody here who got to work so yes could you please explain to me how send and article or url where i can find the solution.
